ygData.subject: Re: New :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes =) Your bad faction with Ogres would be gone because of the illusions, but your bad faction with BouncersofOgguk would still remain. ...   ...
ygData.messageBody:
Yes =)
Your bad faction with Ogres would be gone because of
the illusions, but your bad faction with
BouncersofOgguk would still remain.

--- James <manickd@...> wrote:
> Hi I am new to the list.
>
> I just started playing a Enchanter after being
> tempted to play one for 5 or
> 6 months. Well SO far so good, but I am a little
> shaky on a few things. Say
> I am KOS in Ogre city as a Dark Elf because I killed
> 200 bouncer. Then I
> cast Illousion Ogre. Would I still be KOS?
>
>
>
>

<html>
